featured.text: There is no record of whether Shaw ever sent the tickets. 54.
He didn’t want to take Shaw’s insult.
What was Shaw trying to say to Churchill on his card? (A) Churchill should not go to the play alone.

definition.zh_def: 小屋，通常用於農場或鄉村地區，作為倉庫或簡單的居住空間。
definition.en_def: A small, simple building, often used for storage or as a shelter in rural areas.
definition.example: They built a cozy shaw in the backyard to store their gardening tools.
